name: Entrenchment Ratio (ER)
functionStatement: Frequent overbank flows reduce flood peaks, support riparian vegetation, create off-channel refugia, and extend nutrient processing time.
descriptionMarkdown: Degree of floodplain access during moderate floods; low ER indicates incision and reduced overbank connectivity.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Channel/Floodplain

Method: Field (survey) or Desktop (LiDAR cross sections)
howToMeasureMarkdown: Measure flood-prone width and bankfull width/depth per SQT method; compute ER = flood-prone width / bankfull width (or per SQT definition).

inputs.label: Entrenchment Ratio (ER)
inputs.helpMarkdown: Field cross-section measurements and/or LiDAR/DEM-derived flood-prone width and bankfull indicators.

references: Rosgen stream classification references as applicable
